Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!
To celebrate the release of Kerbal Space Program 2 Early Access, we are having a giveaway: Three copies of Kerbal Space Program 2 are up for grabs to members of this forum!


To enter, simply comment in this thread with something that you're excited for! (Only one entry will be counted per person. The purpose of this thread is as a giveaway and to share what you are excited for; off-topic complaints or comments about KSP2 should be posted in the appropriate forum location.)
Giveaway ends at 6PM PT Thursday! Countdown is here! The prizes will be given to the winners on launch day.
Good luck!

 

Congratulations to @gussi111 @ILikeIke and @TruthfulGnome on winning! Someone will be reaching out to you very shortly to give you your key.

I am excited for colonies. They are a game changer. I've loved surface bases and now I can take them to the next level.

Edit: First comment! I wanted to comment that but given the amount of time it would take to type I didn’t want to be second due to that. Congrats in advance to the winners!

Edited February 22, 2023 by BeastHunter

Im excited to see all the new sights going interstellar will bring! Im also excited to see what we all are excited for!

130302222023

I am excited to start the very long journey of KSP2 and to see if it's potential can indeed be fulfilled.

Edited February 22, 2023 by dansiegel30
I'm just as excited for colonies and interstellar as the next guy, but right off the bat? Honestly I'm just excited to go back to basics and just fly a Mun mission or build a space station.
Eagerly awaiting the first giant leap for Kerbalkind
Excited about procedural wings ! Now I can finally make some good looking aircraft. The devs also hinted about new features on the bodies, really intrigued about that too.
I'm most excited for colonies, and using the ability to build spacecraft off world in innovative ways.

Personally I'm excited for the grass. I can touch it without leaving the room!

And I'm terrified of Puf. Always watching...
I'm excited for actually functional colonies and bases.
I am excited for the beautiful new planets!
I'm excited for the improved graphics, as well as the interstellar stuff (whenever that gets added). Ooh, and also the parts painting!
I'm excited for the new gameplay features and all the new possiblities that KSP 2 will give us
Most excited to see how many people this game will inspire to Never stop learning. Oh and frying space frogs
I'm excited for colony building and management. But I'm most looking forward to finally playing with my friends and having a little space race in multiplayer.

I'm excited for interstellar and colonies like everyone else. If I had to choose something from day one of EA, probably the new terrain graphics and the procedural wings. No more building 200 part wings!

The underlying changes especially excites me. Individual features are sweet, but not even going beyond what we already have in KSP 1 + QOL, seeing the work the crew has put into how resources flow, improving how the game deals with physics and high-speed collisions, how the editor handles parts that are placed but not attached to other parts (permitting ofc parallel vessel construction and workspaces ), et cetera. All this is going to make KSP 2 worth the wait, even under EA conditions
I'm excited about the biodiversity of the planets, new and old
I'm excited for the bigger landing legs. The smaller ones from the original can be a bit of a bottleneck with larger craft.
I'm excited to see the new VAB and SPH, and the tiny details and Easter eggs!
I'm excited  to put a colony around Laythe and make it my second home to see Jool all day

Can't wait to build bigger Space stations

Edited February 22, 2023 by dzin
I'm excited for interstellar stuff and new PBR shader. Imagine wonders that can be made with that stuff!
Clouds. Clouds. CLOUDS!!!
I am excited for the new science system and new things to explore on planets' surface.
